M13/1/AXHIN/SP1/HIN/TZ0/XX




     22130095


HINDI A: LITERATURE – STANDARD LEVEL – PAPER 1
HINDI A : LITTéRATURE – NIVEAU MOYEN – ÉPREUVE 1
HINDI A: LITERATURA – NIVEL MEDIO – PRUEBA 1

Wednesday 8 May 2013 (morning)
Mercredi 8 mai 2013 (matin)
Miércoles 8 de mayo de 2013 (mañana)

1 hour 30 minutes / 1 heure 30 minutes / 1 hora 30 minutos


INSTRUCTIONS TO CANDIDATES

 Do not open this examination paper until instructed to do so.
 Write a guided literary analysis on one passage only. In your answer you must address both of
  the guiding questions provided.
 The maximum mark for this examination paper is [20 marks].

INSTRUCTIONS DESTINÉES AUX CANDIDATS

 N’ouvrez pas cette épreuve avant d’y être autorisé(e).
 Rédigez une analyse littéraire dirigée d’un seul des passages. Les deux questions d’orientation
  fournies doivent être traitées dans votre réponse.
 Le nombre maximum de points pour cette épreuve d’examen est [20 points].

INSTRUCCIONES PARA LOS ALUMNOS

 No abra esta prueba hasta que se lo autoricen.
 Escriba un análisis literario guiado sobre un solo pasaje. Debe abordar las dos preguntas de
  orientación en su respuesta.
 La puntuación máxima para esta prueba de examen es [20 puntos].




2213-0095                                                                                   4 pages/páginas

1.

            “itvaarI, panaI Dala.” DI.jaI.ema narao<ama saraoja kI BaarI Aavaaja, baahr sTUla pr baOzo ramanaarayaNa itvaarI ko poT maoM paro

            Aa^MKaoM maoM Jaa^Mka.“Aar. Aao. ka matlaba ek trh ka e@vaagaaD- sar.” vah idKa donaa caahta qaa ik vah kao[- ima+I ka

            kuC mauskra gayaa.mauskra tao itvaarI BaI jaata, pr ]sakI CatI maoM narao<ama ka kha “baovakUf”SaUla kI trh gaD, gayaa qaa.

            itvaarI kI kBaI Aasa-pasa ko dsa gaa^MvaaoM maoM jajamaanaI qaI.vah jaba BaI gaa^Mva jaata tao BaUla hI jaata ik vah Baart sarkar
            ko ek saava-jainak ]pk`ma maoM caprasaI hO.gaa^Mva ko basa AD\Do pr ]trto hI ]saka sa%kar Sau$ hao jaata qaa.gaa^Mva tao yaha^M
            sao lagaBaga ek iklaaomaITr dUr qaa, pr toja QaUp maoM BaI yah dUrI maIzI lagatI qaI.hr dsa kdma pr, kao[- AadmaI yaa AaOrt,
            ramaa-Syaamaa krta qaa yaa pOr CU laota qaa.gaa^Mva maoM Aaja tk nahIM batayaa qaa ik vah idllaI maoM caprasaI ko pd pr hO.

            maoM Apnao AfsaraoM ko jaUzo bat-na Qaaota hO. .“Aar. Aao. yaaina irvasa- Aa^smaaoisasa isasTma.” narao<ama nao kha tao itvaarI ka
            mau^Mh Kula gayaa, Aa^MKoM isakuD, ga[-M AaOr maaqao pr salavaToM Aa ga[-M. “AcCa CaoD, tU ka^fI Dala AaOr jaa.” “yasa sar.”

     25     ]sanao ApnaI kmaIja kI AastInaaoM kao Kaola kr, klaa[- tk laakr baTna lagaae. “ha^M , jara e. saI. doK, iktnao
            pr hO.” “saahba baa[sa pr hO.” “Aza[sa pr kr do, hr kama pUC krogaa @yaa ?”]sakI naja,roM Aba BaI kmPyaUTr pr gaD,I
            hu[- qaIM. “baap na maarI maoMZkI, baoTa tIrMdaja.” itvaarI kao ijatnaI gaailayaa^M yaad qaIM ]sanao mana-hI-mana saba do DalaIM.]sao
            baothaSaa phlaovaalaa DI.jaI.ema manaaohr pTola yaad Aayaa.manaaohr pTola kBaI itvaarI kao naama sao nahIM pukarta qaa.Apnao
            jaUzo bat-na Qaulavaanaa tao dUr vah ]sasao panaI iplaanao kao BaI nahIM khta qaa.
     30     “lao itvaarI .”narao<ama kI trf itvaarI kI naja,roM ]zI qaIM.]sa haqa maoM dao kagaja qao. haqa kI idSaa itvaarI kI
            trf qaI AaOr inagaahoM Aba BaI kmPyaUTr pr gaD,I hu[- qaIM.halaa^Mik kagaja,aoM kI ilaKavaT AMga`ojaI qaI, pr matlaba kI
            baat hao tao ilaKavaT caInaI BaaYaa maoM BaI samaJaI jaa saktI hO.vah jaaor sao icallaanaa caahta qaa, pr icallaa na saka.
            “AapkI maohrbaanaI sar, Aap jauga-jauga ijaAao sar, AapkI pd-p`itYza AaOr baZ,o. “KuSa hO tU ?” itvaarI kI Aa^MKaoM maoM

      bailk saalao, jaIjaa, Baa[-, BaaOjaa[-, maaOsaa-maaOsaI sabakao ek-ek krko ]naka hala caala pUCto hue AMt maoM [sakI saUcanaa
      BaI sahja ZMga sao do dI. “itvaarI ! jaa jara svaIpr kao baulaa laa.”Aba na yah Aavaaja ]sao cauBaI AaOr na hI kao[-
      GabarahT sarsara[-. ]sanao ek kmaro sao dUsaro kmaro AaOr ifr ek tla sao dUsaro tla tk, saBaI saMBaaivat jagahaoM pr svaIpr
      kao ZU^MZ,a, pr vah nahIM imalaa.itvaarI samaJa gayaa ik laayakrama dFtr maoM nahIM hO. “saahba, na khIM laayakrama hO AaOr na
   40 dugaa-dasa.” “zIk hO tU jaa.kla laayakrama kao kh donaa.” “ maOM krta hU^M na sar. Aap naahk proSaana haoMgao.”
      “tuma ?” narao<ama kI naja,roM phlaI baar itvaarI kI naja,raoM sao imalaI.Anapoixat Z,ga sao [sa p`Sna maoM AaScaya- Aadr AaOr
      Akbakapna qaa. “@yaaoM sar, @yaa hmaaro Gar maoM baaqa$ma baMd nahIM haota ? basa dao DMDo maarta hU^M, saba zIk.” khto hue
      itvaarI Ta^yalaoT maoM Gausa gayaa.Ta^yalaoT sao Gar Gau||r- Gar Gau||r- kI Aavaaja,oM Aanao lagaI. “kama maoM @yaa Sama-, sar.”
      itvaarI kI Aavaaja [nhIM Aavaaja,aoM ko baIca baahr Aa[-.

                                                                  Ajaya naavairyaa, yasa sar, EaoYz ihndI khainayaa^M, janavarI (2010)


            (A)    khanaI maoM p`stut pa~aoM kI mana:isqait AaOr pirisqait ko baaro maoM Aap @yaa khnaa caahto hOM ?

            (ba)   laoKk Wara kqaa p`saMga ka vaNa-na evaM [sako p`Baava ko baaro maoM Aap @yaa khnaa caahto hOM ?

2.

                                                           laaokgaIt bana jaanaa caahtI hU^M

                                                 tuma rhto hao gaussao kI Aaga maoM maoro sajanaa,
                                                 pr maOM bana jaanaa caahtI hU^M ,zMZo, maIzo panaI ka Jarnaa,
                                                 tuma caahto hao maoro maaqao pr ibandI Ta^Mknaa
                                                 maOM AakaSa maoM naxa~ bananaa caahtI hU^M
                                 5     AaOr pOraoM maoM Cnak-Cnak bajatI paayala
                                                 maOM gaulaamaI kI hqakD,I, pOraoM kI baoiD,yaa^M
                                                 taoD,naa caahtI hU^M , tuma Barnaa caahto hao -
                                                  maorI saUnaI maa^Mga maoM laala isandUr
                                                  maOM saUnaI duinayaa^M ko kOnavaasa maoM KUbasaUrt
                                10               rMga Barnaa caahtI hU^M.tuma jananaa caahto hao
                                                 mauJasao baccao
                                                 maOM pUrI duinayaa^M ko Anaaqa baccao Apnaanaa caahtI hU^M.
                                                 tuma Barnaa caahto hao mauJao ApnaI baa^MhaoM maoM
                                                 maOM ApnaI baa^MhaoM maoM duinayaa ka dd- samaoTnaa caahtI hU^M
                                15     tuma maoro Aa^Mcala maoM laanaa caahto hao caa^Md-isataro
                                                 maOM caa^Md-isatara bananaa caahtI hU^M.
                                                 tuma maoro krIba Aanaa caahto hao - maOM irSto kao
                                                 KUbasaUrt maaoD, dokr vaapsa mauD, jaanaa caahtI hU^M.
                                                 tuma caahto hao ik maOM gaIt gaunagaunaa}^M - maOM
                                20     laaokgaIt bana jaanaa caahtI hU^M.
                                                 tuma tao maoro kRYNa nahIM hao -pr maOM
                                                 maIra bana jaanaa caahtI hU^M.
                                                 maOM pUrI duinayaa^M maoM
                                                 p`oma kI KuSabaU ibaKornaa caahtI hU^M
                               25      maOM sabakI bananaa caahtI hU^M
                                                 [tnaa hI Antr hO ik Saayad [saIilae tumhoM
                                                 jaInao kI tmannaa hO AaOr
                                                 maOM mar jaanaa caahtI hU^M .

                                                                                                  ivajaya laxmaI, ]<ara, jaulaa[- (2006)


            (A)    kivata ka kond`Iya Baava @yaa hO AaOr yaha^M kiva maanava jaIvana ko iksa pxa kao ]jaagar kr rha hO ?

            (ba)   naarI kI Aavaaja evaM ]sakI caaht kao kivata maoM iksa p`kar p`stut ikyaa gayaa hO ?
